title: What's the point of PBE if we're not required to test anything?
body: I've been playing all day and not once have I had the opportunity to test anything. Champs get banned. Skin-release champs get banned. How am I supposed to test anything when it's impossible to do so? Why is there no stipulation requiring us to play champs and game modes being tested?

replies.body:
The PBE exists to test balance adaptation, player behavior and reaction as much as it does new content.

Making it artificial kind of defeats the point, riot does playtests like that internally.

>
> The PBE exists to test balance adaptation, player behavior and reaction as much as it does new content.
> 
> Making it artificial kind of defeats the point, riot does playtests like that internally.

Ahh, makes sense. So we're not actually testing, we're just doing.
